title: Set Image Memory cards to a fixed 2:3 aspect ratio

requirements.text: Update the Image Memory section so each image card (both front image side and back message side) renders in a fixed 2:3 aspect ratio (width:height), replacing the current 4:3 aspect ratio sizing.

quotes: In image section change the grid size of each image to 2:3 ratio

acceptanceCriteria: Each ImageMemoryCard displays at a 2:3 aspect ratio on the front side (image/placeholder) and the back side (message).
The 3D flip interaction still aligns correctly (front/back faces overlap and match dimensions).
Image upload, Replace/Add button placement, and Adjust/Save framing interactions still work and remain usable at the new aspect ratio.
No changes are made to the Video Memory section (it should remain 2:3 as already implemented).

constraints: Frontend changes must not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce new backend services or databases; image memory sizing is a frontend-only change.
nonGoals: Changing the number of image cards, memory persistence behavior, or the flip animation style beyond what is required to support the 2:3 aspect ratio.
Altering user-facing text/copy in the Image Memory section.
